column5: Keep in mind they are talking good strong BLACK/Clear Ice  Stay Safe
Thanks Bill... 3 inches is definitely a little shy...
Nope.. guy that has a floatplane in my hangar. Pictures from his early days in the bush... before he became an Air Canada 747 Captain !

thats very to know...... holy crap. well atleast you learn from your mistakes! i hope....  oh and i think this is a good thread to sticky for the early part of the season for the people that are not to familiar with ice fishing!
is that a submarine there Wayne?

Did anyone catch the guy on the the news last night. He was on Little lake here and there was 8 inches of ice on it.He was saying how dangerous it was out there and the sleders were crazy for being out there. 8 INCHES.  Why the news lets people like that on tv, I,ll never know.   Maybe he didnt want anyone else on the lake so he could catch all the snot rockets himself.
So why were you fishin on 3 inches Bill?Nauty Boy get a float suit if your going to do that.
I'll save the ice for my drinks.  I'm still floatin' my boat to fish.
Ice fishin'???  ... but wouldn't that be like freezin' cold???
